amendment.description: To require a report on the availability of potential overland ballistic missile defense test ranges.

action.text: Amendment SA 3167, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3167 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3167 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S6718; text: CR S6718) To require a report on the availability of potential overland ballistic missile defense test ranges.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3167 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3167 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Domenici.
